title: Water Bolt

properties.name: description
properties.value: Water Bolt is the second weakest water spell available in the standard spellbook. This spell requires two air runes, two water runes, and one chaos rune to cast. Without boosts, the maximum damage of this spell is 10.

content:

Water Bolt
Released 24 May 2001 (Update)
Members No
Level 23
Spellbook Standard
Type Combat
Experience 16.5
Element Water
Damage 10
Runes 2 2 1
Casting speed 5 ticks
Description A low level Water missile
Animation
Sound Effect

Water Bolt is the second weakest water spell available in the standard spellbook. This spell requires two air runes, two water runes, and one chaos rune to cast. Without boosts, the maximum damage of this spell is 10.

Players who have completed the Family Crest quest can wear chaos gauntlets which increase the maximum damage of this spell.

'''Water Bolt''' is the second weakest [[water spell]] available in the [[standard spellbook]]. This spell requires two [[air rune]]s, two [[water rune]]s, and one [[chaos rune]] to cast. Without boosts, the maximum damage of this spell is 10.

Players who have completed the [[Family Crest]] quest can wear [[chaos gauntlets]] which increase the maximum damage of this spell.
